data.title: Dell Technologies Alliance
data.meta_description: Deloitte and Dell Technologies: Together, the Deloitte and Dell Technologies alliance delivers demonstrated business solutions with leading technology.
data.text:
Why choose Deloitte and Dell Technologies

Best-in-class capabilities: We created the Deloitte and Dell Technologies alliance by drawing on strengths from each organization with the goal of providing best-in-class technology solutions to our clients.

Strong track record of success: For years Deloitte and Dell Technologies have successfully worked together to help solve our enterprise clients' most complex infrastructure, technology, cloud strategy, and business challenges.

Strategic approach: Our successful engagements with a large, diverse group of clients have demonstrated the importance of taking a strategic approach to technology, solution design, integrations, and implementation.

Deloitte and Pivotal

Increasingly, applications are becoming cloud-native, enabling organizations to bring them to market faster and changing the processes by which they are developed, deployed, and managed. Getting these applications to work requires the right architecture and combination of components. Deloitte and Pivotal empower organizations with the freedom of choice, supporting run anywhere hosting and operations in the public or private cloud, co-locations, and on-premise data centers.

About Dell Technologies

Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that provides the essential infrastructure for organizations to build their digital future, transform IT and protect their most important asset—information. The company services customers of all sizes, ranging from 98 percent of the Fortune 500 to individual consumers, with the industry’s broadest and most comprehensive innovative portfolio from edge to core to cloud.
